message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we can both enjoy our gains.

Bob, last chance. Take this offer and we both get something. Otherwise, we'll both end up with nothing. Don't be greedy!

Bob, this is it. My final offer. Take it or leave it. It's your last chance to get anything!
